classes.card: bg-gray-50 border border-gray-200 rounded-xl shadow-sm p-6
classes.primaryButton: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-500 text-white font-semibold px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-all hover:scale-105
classes.secondaryButton: border border-gray-300 hover:bg-gray-100 text-slate-700 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-all
